native static double, double, double, double '''GetFullscreenRect'''(double vwidth, double vheight, int fsmode)
== Usage == Gets a bounding area correctly scaled to fit the current view port. This can be used to calculate a virtual resolution within it to scale coordinates by or to scale a texture to fill the entire view port.
=== Parameters === *''vwidth'' - The width of the bounding box *''vheight'' - The height of the bounding box *''fsmode'' - The type of fullscreen mode to use when scaling the coordinates {{: FSMode}}
=== Return value === Returns four values in the following order: *The starting x coordinate of the box in the view port *The starting y coordinate of the box in the view port *The width of the box *The height of the box
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
